analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalam na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato hetusampayutto
analyzed: hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ hetu sampayutto

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ
hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha
